practice_phrases.target: I wanted to speak last month
he wanted to meet last month
I started to learn last month
I was trying to speak with you last month

practice_phrases.known: 我开始上个月读这个故事
practice_phrases.target: I started to read the story last month

practice_phrases.known: 我不确定我上个月是否准备好了
practice_phrases.target: I was not sure if I was ready last month

practice_phrases.known: 我想上个月和别人说英语
practice_phrases.target: I wanted to speak English with everyone else last month

practice_phrases.known: 我期待比上个月说得更好
practice_phrases.target: I am looking forward to speaking better than I was last month

practice_phrases.known: 我开始考虑上个月如何说英语
practice_phrases.target: I started to think about how to speak English last month
